bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. of a recurrent, long-term lao juan 勞倦 , exhaustion to fatigue. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 4: 凡 男女因積勞虛損，或大病後不復，常苦四體沉滯，骨肉疼酸 , “Whenever males and females following an accumulating exhaustion experience a state of depletion detriment, or if after a massive disease they have not yet recovered, they will continuously suffer from sluggish [qi] deep in their four extremities, with their bones and flesh being in pain”.
